ValidationRule.description: Owning Faculty is required when Status is changed to design
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Product_Request_Status__c), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName ='Program', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Unit', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Module'), ISBLANK(Owning_Faculty__c), ISPICKVAL(Product_Request_Status__c, 'Design') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Owning Faculty” is required to update the Product Request Status.
